2099690.name: Dungeons Diced
2099690.description:
Choices Matter! a Nod to classic Dungeon crawlers, Start off by creating a character, that feels much like a tabletop-style fantasy game.
You Explore a procedurally generated/HandCrafted Dungeon in FPS, with your unique character, Combat is turn-based. but there is a twist. it's not just rolling dice, Based on; your character stats, and equipment. weapons, skill lines, classes, levels, and combat events you have choices in combat to make, from hundreds of attacks. The Attacks arent all offensive, set up your attacks in chains, combos, leveraging positions, and accessing special attacks. From an intuitive combat system, (Specialized Rogue Dagger Attacks being available after doing a dodge, for example) The combat is augmented by dice rolls. Offensive and Defensive attacks, filter through combat, from the current state of the combat, is the enemy charging? is the enemy Stunned? perhaps the enemy is charging a significant attack! you are setting up chain attacks, positioning your character in future attacks, and causing the combat to have a unique feel and be very tactical. Death is permanent. last as long as you can. be the Dungeons Diced Legend!


Turn-based combat is time and event based. choose from all the available actions, based on the combat state, perhaps setting up for counter strikes, or crippling your enemy, play your cards right and unleash devastating attacks.
